channel.title: Need quick help
channel.description:
ok guys hey umm im trying to code my server but i cant compile and without that u cant do anything
it says i need jdk 6.0 can someone tell me a link to get it and tell me if compile is gonna work as soon as i dl it or something do i add it in the source file
can someone please help :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 21, 2008, 09:13:16 am[/size][hr]and also ill make who ever helps me admin or co on my server and also my server ip is tyroscape.no-ip.biz its gonna be off until i get ansewers

item.title: Need quick help
item.dc:creator: @tyronation1 tyronation1
item.description:
@tyronation1 wrote:

i did that its version 0.7 but that code that dude gave me earleir did nothing i copy and pasted that code into my compile edit notepad

then i saved and tried to compile and nothing happened

Read full topic

item.title: Need quick help
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

or! find what java version uhave by going to program files, then look for java, double click it n see wat jdk version you have, for example mine is

jdk1.6.0_07

so fr my compiler i use this script;
code:
@echo off
title d-d-s-p-3-c compile/run
“C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_07/bin/javac.exe” *.java
“C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_07/bin/java.exe” -Xmx512m server
pause

just edit the bit with jdk1.6.0_07

to ur jdk version.

Read full topic

item.title: Need quick help
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

What JDK version do you have?
Try this;

@echo off title Compiling using 6u7... "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java title Compiled successfully... pause
If that doesn’t work change;

"C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java

To;

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java

If none of these work, then tell me your java version.

Read full topic
